post.text: As secretary of state, Hillary restored our reputation around the world and made us safer.

comment.author: Katherine
comment.text: Nonsense self appraisal - the middle East is in a mess , thanks to Hillary

replies.author: Dayton
replies.text: Hi Katherine, Is it true that obama denied Nigeria weapons and a helicopter in order to fight Boko Haram? Nigeria gov't said the obama administration would not provide 'us' with intelligence despite the fact that they have several drones and sophisticated aircraft overflying the North-east of Nigeria from bases in Nigeria where the Boko Haram fighters and movements are clearly in their sights.
